Container.Name: playit.gg
Container.Overview:
Official Docker from ghcr.io/playit-cloud/playit-agent
Used to map services, e.g. game server or websites behind cgnat or other restricted networks.
Just put in the secret key generated on playit.gg/account/agents/new-docker into the SECRET_KEY and you are good to go. Please also map the secret folder to a appropriate location.
Using this docker container, will ensure after an update the agent still connects.
All credits go to the playit.gg team.
